name: EmoGaze Insights: Ad Impact with fMRI and BGI
description: We combine fMRI with Eye Tracking and Brain Guided Interpretation (BGI) to gather valuable insights. fMRI measures unconscious emotions and reactions activated by your ads, judged against established benchmarks. Optimize your ads and reduce ad-spending.

name: CardioClear: Precision Heart Disease Care Powered by AI
description: CardioClear transforms heart disease treatment with AI. Our platform uses coronary computed tomography angiography (CCTA) imaging to identify atherosclerosis earlier. Simplify heart disease evaluation and reporting for improved outcomes.

name: OncoPath: AI-Driven Disease Progression Tracking
description: Tailored for oncologists, our solution streamlines disease progression monitoring with automated lesion quantification, tracking for reports, and therapy response criteria reporting, integrated with EMRs or Tempus Hub.

name: FractureFinder: AI-Enhanced Bone Fracture Detection
description: Our AI-driven medical imaging solution uncovers concealed bone fractures. Machine learning identifies patterns indicative of fractures, assisting in accurate diagnosis. Empower radiology experts to improve patient care.
